Class RadialMeter

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      RadialMeter

public class RadialMeter
extends greenfoot.Actor

Radial Meter Represents an amount out of a total in a radial format, capable of depletion and replenishment.

Version:
V1.1 (Monday, September 30, 2013)
Author:
Daniel Chung

                   double maxValue,

                   double radius,
                   double width,
                   java.awt.Color gaugeColour,
                   java.awt.Color centreColour)
Creates RadialMeter object with parameters below

Parameters:
Actor - target The Actor object to which this health bar will follow.
double - maxValue The maximum value to be represented by the full bar
double - currentValue The current value of the variable represented by the bar
double - radius The radius of the entire circle on which the bar is drawn
double - width The width of the actual bar around the circumference
Color - gaugeColour The colour of the space behind the bar
Color - fillColour The colour of the bar
Method Detail

act

public void act()
Every turn, the bar will change its position to remain above its target (if applicable), and will be removed if its target is destroyed. Its image is also updated to include changes from the turn.

Overrides:
act in class greenfoot.Actor

decreaseCurrentValue

public void decreaseCurrentValue(double amount)
Deducts current value of bar by specified double amount, going no lower than zero, and updates image of the bar.

Parameters:
double - amount The amount that is to be deducted from the current value of the bar

getCurrentValue

public double getCurrentValue()

increaseCurrentValue

public void increaseCurrentValue(double amount)
Increases current value of bar by specified double amount, going no higher than its maximum value, and updates image of the bar.

Parameters:
double - amount The amount that is to be added to the current value of the bar

removeFromWorld

public void removeFromWorld()

setCurrentValue

public void setCurrentValue(double amount)
Changes current value of bar to specified double amount, and updates image of the bar.

Parameters:
double - amount The amount that is to be the current value of the bar
